select pty.Pic_Icon,pbi.Project_Title,par.Project_No,pbi.Year_Rate,pbi.Amount, pbi.Deadline,pbi.Deadline_Type,par.Reward_Rate,par.Rate_Add_Rate, par.Reward_Icon, par.Invest_Rate,replayway.name1,par.Member_ID,pap.Start_Date,pap.End_Date, par.Invest_Statu, par.Increase_Range,par.MinStart,par.Invest_Max,
pap.Record_Date,pap.Real_End_Date,
(pbi.Amount-(select ifnull(sum(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(Invest_Amount_Valid),#{sKey})) as signed)),0) from Invest_Record where Apply_Id=par.Apply_Id and IsValid=0 )) availableaAmount,
(select Level_Mark from Credit_Level where mi.Credit_Integral between Credit_Score_Min and Credit_Score_Max and statu =1) as Level_Mark
from Project_App_Record par left join Project_App_Process pap on pap.Apply_Id=par.Apply_Id left join Project_Base_Info pbi on par.Project_Base_ID=pbi.Project_Base_ID left join ProjectBaseInfo pty on par.Project_ID=pty.Project_ID left join DICT replayway on replayway.code1= pbi.Repay_Way and replayway.tcode = 'DICT_HKFS' left join Member_Info mi on mi.Member_ID = par.Member_ID where par.Apply_Id=#{id}
select ifnull(sum(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(Invest_Amount_Valid),#{map.sKey})) as signed)),0) as investTotal from Invest_Record where Project_Id=#{projectid}
select count(1) from Project_App_Record par where par.Member_ID=#{memberId} and par.Invest_Statu>=3

select mat.Attest_TypeName,ptd.Attest_Type_ID,mat.Member_Type from Member_Attest_Type mat left join Project_Type_Datum ptd on mat.Attest_Type_ID= ptd.Attest_Type_ID where ptd.Project_ID =#{projectType}
select pap.Start_Date,pap.End_Date,pap.Record_Date,pap.Real_End_Date, pap.Hold_Date,pap.ProEnd_Date,pap.Settle_Date from Project_App_Process pap where pap.Apply_Id=#{ID} and pap.Hold_Date is not null
select pbi.Project_Descript as projectDescript from Project_App_Record par left join Project_Base_Info pbi on par.Project_Base_ID=pbi.Project_Base_ID where par.Apply_Id=#{projectID}
